    • Uses of HideViewOnScrollAnimation in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.animation

      Methods in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.animation with parameters of type HideViewOnScrollAnimation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HideViewOnScrollAnimationListener.onScrollingDown(HideViewOnScrollAnimation animation, View animatedView, int scrollPosition)
      The method, which is invoked, when the list view, which is observed by the animation, is scrolling downwards.
      void HideViewOnScrollAnimationListener.onScrollingUp(HideViewOnScrollAnimation animation, View animatedView, int scrollPosition)
      The method, which is invoked, when the list view, which is observed by the animation, is scrolling upwards.
